comment:
барксцена - кучка матросов окружила сервитора, тот вертится на месте или иначе дергается
Матрос

languages.text: "Было уже такое! Надо его повязать, он тогда вырубится, очухается и потом опять нормально работать будет... Только осторожно!"

traits.locale_text: "Было уже такое! Надо его повязать, он тогда вырубится, очухается и потом опять нормально работать будет... Только осторожно!"

languages.text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"
languages.original_text: "Было уже такое! Надо его повязать, он тогда вырубится, очухается и потом опять нормально работать будет... Только осторожно!"

traits.locale_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"
"It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"
"It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"
"It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

languages.text: “以前也发生过这种事情！你得把它绑起来，让它关机一段时间。之后等它重新启动之后，就又恢复正常了……不过要当心！”
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: “以前也发生过这种事情！你得把它绑起来，让它关机一段时间。之后等它重新启动之后，就又恢复正常了……不过要当心！”

languages.text: «¡No sería la primera vez! Solo tienes que atarlo. Se desconecta un rato y, cuando se reinicia, funciona con normalidad. ¡Pero ten cuidado!».
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No sería la primera vez! Solo tienes que atarlo. Se desconecta un rato y, cuando se reinicia, funciona con normalidad. ¡Pero ten cuidado!».

languages.text: 「前にもこんなことがあった！縛り上げないと。しばらく機能停止させて再起動すれば、普通に動き出すんだ…でも気をつけて！」
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: 「前にもこんなことがあった！縛り上げないと。しばらく機能停止させて再起動すれば、普通に動き出すんだ…でも気をつけて！」
「前にもこんなことがあった！縛り上げないと。しばらく機能停止させて再起動すれば、普通に動き出すんだ…でも気をつけて！」

languages.text: "Das ist schon einmal geschehen! Ihr müsst ihn fesseln. Er wird eine Weile bewusstlos, und wenn er dann rebootet, läuft er wieder ganz normal ... Aber seid vorsichtig!"
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist schon einmal geschehen! Ihr müsst ihn fesseln. Er wird eine Weile bewusstlos, und wenn er dann rebootet, läuft er wieder ganz normal ... Aber seid vorsichtig!"

languages.text: « C'est déjà arrivé avant ! Il faut l'attacher. Il se désactive pendant un moment, puis il reprend une activité normale après avoir redémarré... Mais méfiez-vous ! »
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est déjà arrivé avant ! Il faut l'attacher. Il se désactive pendant un moment, puis il reprend une activité normale après avoir redémarré... Mais méfiez-vous ! »

languages.text: "Daha önce de oldu! Bağlamanız gerek. Bir süre arızalı gibi davranıyor, sonra kendini tekrar başlattığında yine normal çalışıyor. Yalnız dikkatli olun!"
languages.original_text: "It's happened before! You need to tie it up. It conks out for a while, then when it reboots, it starts running normally again... But be careful!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu daha önce de oldu! Bağlamanız gerek. Bir süre arızalı gibi davranıyor, sonra kendini tekrar başlattığında kusur giderilmiş oluyor. Yalnız dikkatli olunuz!
